command: echo 'Installing the FMBYAS assembler (fmasm) and emulator (fmemu)'; echo 'Compiling fmemu and fmasm'; mkdir dist/; g++ src/emulator.cpp -o dist/fmemu $MENUMAKE_OPTIONS_0; g++ src/assembler.cpp -o dist/fmasm $MENUMAKE_OPTIONS_1;sudo chmod +x dist/fmemu; sudo chmod +x dist/fmasm; sudo mv dist/fmemu /usr/local/bin/fmemu; sudo mv dist/fmasm /usr/local/bin/fmasm; echo 'Installation completed'
